title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.76 - Gouverneur Correctional Facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.76 - Gouverneur Correctional Facility

State Regulations
(a) There shall be in the department a
facility to be known as Gouverneur Correctional Facility, which shall be
located in the Town of Gouverneur in St. Lawrence County, and which shall
consist of property under the jurisdiction of the department at that
location. (b) Gouverneur

Correctional Facility shall be a correctional facility for males 18 years of
age or older. (c) Gouverneur

Correctional Facility shall be classified as a medium security correctional
facility, to be used as a general confinement facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7

100.76

Amended

New

York State Register July 22, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
